sn22.65:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.65:5.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.65:5.9: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.65:6.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.65:6.3: Rūpaṃ kho, bhikkhu, abhinandamāno baddho mārassa;
sn22.65:6.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti … pe …
sn22.65:6.11: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
